description: The Ballad of Dood and Juanita is the upcoming seventh studio album by American country music singer-songwriter Sturgill Simpson, due to be released on August 20, 2021. Simpson describes the album as "traditional country, bluegrass and mountain music, including gospel and a cappella." Willie Nelson guests on the song "Juanita".
title: The Ballad of Dood and Juanita
